keyword: how many calories in sour cream
title: How Many Calories in Sour Cream?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in sour cream per 100g serving, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and variations for low-fat options.
h1: How Many Calories in Sour Cream?
assumptions: Full-fat sour cream, standard cultured dairy; no added flavors or thickeners.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, fat content, and production method. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: Sour cream contains about 193 kcal per 100g, mostly from fat.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in 1 tablespoon of sour cream?
faqs.a: About 29 kcal for 1 tbsp (15g) of full-fat sour cream.

faqs.q: What are the macros in sour cream?
Is sour cream high in saturated fat?
faqs.a: Yes, about 11.6g saturated fat per 100g, mostly from dairy.

faqs.q: How does low-fat sour cream compare?
faqs.a: Low-fat has ~84 kcal per 100g, with reduced fat to 3g.

faqs.q: Does sour cream have lactose or sugars?
faqs.a: Contains ~3.5g sugars per 100g, primarily lactose from milk.
